name: Katherine Esquivel
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
I am excited to apply for the bud-tender position. I'd love to bring my dedication along with my five year experience to your company. It makes me thrilled to know that more are supportive of the MMJ industry as i have always believed it holds a bigger purpose with the direction THC/CBD research is moving. My commitment to customer satisfaction  has been 
extremely beneficial when dealing with patients in sales, it helped me realize the most important factor is the patient. Thus I take their needs personally

and always help them find the right strain and dosage for their condition. I like to treat them as such not just a client in business. I excel in the role of dealing with upset 

patients; I like to rapidly solve problems to prevent the loss of key accounts. In addition to exemplary customer service, administrative tasks are my strong suit.  I comprehend

the quality and timeliness of reports, attention to detail, and I always like to demonstrate a POSITIVE team-player attitude. I am knowledgeable about every cannabis strain

benefits as well as effects; its method of ingestion and when each method should be employed. In my opinion, cannabis is better than medicine, I know all the disorders that it

can help with, as it acts as a relaxant, anti-inflammatory, antipsychotic, expectorant and it works for sedation. Furthermore, salesmanship is a strong quality I possess which 

is important when it comes to promoting your collective's specials, discounts, etc. 

Thank you in advance for your time.
